document_data.name: House X'larraz'et'soj
document_data.disbanded: [[671 DR]]<ref group="note">They house was destroyed one year after Gromph was born.
document_data.mainbody: '''House X'larraz'et'soj''' was a former [[drow]] house of [[Menzoberranzan]]. It was defeated by [[House Baenre]].
document_data.History: Upon the birth of [[Gromph Baenre]], the [[matron mother]] of this house granted him a ''[[wand of viscid globs]]''. However, House Baenre themselves destroyed House X'larraz'et'soj just one year later, meaning that Gromph had to say that he found the [[wand]] whilst cleaning an attic in House Baenre.
